name: Element Of Life
description:
Grass beats water, water beats fire, fire beats grass.

This is my submission to the Dani's basement game jam.

Top down 2d shooter where you rack up points by killing enemies. You are only able to damage enemies with the right element, but all enemies are able to damage you.

Each time you defeat an enemy, you inherit it's element.

(Note: Enemies might spawn in walls)

Kinda similar to my ludum dare 46 submission... :P
